column4: Is there going to be any better support for the GM965 chipset in hardy? Supposedly it was getting better per release. In glxgears I'm only getting 550 FPS whereas in Hardy I was getting over 1000 FPS. Can anyone suggest something?
Yeah, I'll repeat myself. 550 FPS in Intrepid, 1000 FPS in Hardy. Benchmarking with glxgears.
I see several bugs on it, but I am still digging to see when the milestone is
Cool, thanks. Do you think such milestones will overcome soon?
no idea. I'll let you know what I find
I found a bug on it freezing in #d apps
So, in other words--Intrepid will stay how I'm experiencing it? Let me pastebin my lspci
ok, looks like your hardware isn't included in this bug. I'll add it
Is there anything else you want me to check out to be more specific about the bugs? And, will bug fixes be implemented in Intrepid?
I can't think of anything, I included the information from the pastebin to the bug
